docs.lead_paragraph: The pale gray Ford LTD speeds across the Mall, a genial elderly chauffeur at the wheel. To his right, in a seat normally left vacant in such circumstances or at least reserved for a lesser aide, sits the United States' combined Special Trade Representative (with Cabinet-level Ambassadorial rank)
docs.abstract: Steven Rattner article, Robert Strauss, The President's Trouble-Shooter Wrestles With Inflation, describes Strauss's personality, career, and complexity of inflation-fighting task; illus; cartoons (L)
